entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
